dc:title: Letter to the Unemployed
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Facing the desperation of the Great Depression with hope is difficult. Reminds us of the common laboring life of Christ and the Holy Family. Religion links us in a brotherhood through Christ and is a battle "unto the pulling down of fortifications."
